about_the_game:
Iron Convoy: Demo Version

Step into the ruthless world of Iron Convoy! This free demo invites you to face a survival challenge in a post-apocalyptic wasteland. As the leader of a convoy, you will embark on an adventure filled with resource gathering, strategic vehicle combat, and tough decisions.

What Awaits You in This Demo Version?

Tactical Vehicle Combat

Prepare your convoy for battle and engage strategically against enemies. Experience turn-based combat with options for attack, defense, and repair as each vehicle takes its turn. The position of your lead vehicle can make the difference between victory and defeat!

Resource Management and Survival

Survival is impossible without fuel, food, and crew. Gather resources from ruins and battle loot to keep your convoy running. But beware—running out of resources can have dire consequences.

Explore and Scavenge

Discover randomly placed salvage points on a post-apocalyptic map. Face enemies, find new vehicles, and strengthen your fleet with the loot you acquire.

This demo offers a glimpse into the deep gameplay you will encounter in the full version of Iron Convoy. In this demo, you will experience the core elements of survival. Larger maps, advanced enemy AI, detailed faction systems, and much more await you in the full version!

Fight to survive, conquer to rise. The wastelands are calling you!

content_descriptors.notes:
"Iron Convoy" contains themes of post-apocalyptic survival, with depictions of violence that are integral to combat and scavenging gameplay. Players will engage in vehicular and on-foot battles, where destruction and damage are portrayed through visual effects and animations, but without graphic gore or excessive brutality.

The game does not include sexual content, forced sexual situations, or self-harm depictions. While the narrative touches on themes of survival, scarcity, and moral dilemmas, these are presented in a way that prioritizes strategy and player decision-making over explicit or disturbing content.

Drug or alcohol use does not play a significant role in the game mechanics or story. Environmental hazards, such as sandstorms or acid rain, are included to add realism to the harsh world but do not involve toxic or substance abuse themes.

"Iron Convoy" is designed to challenge players with tactical and resource-management decisions in a tough, hostile environment while avoiding overtly disturbing or explicit themes that may make the experience uncomfortable for sensitive audiences.
